name: Angler Worm
description: The Angler Worm is a massive creature with a powerful physique and unique predatory adaptations. It has a prominent, serpentine body equipped with keen sensory abilities to detect vibrations.
memorable: This creature's ability to create nearly invisible snares and control the battlefield with its Ethereal Lure makes it a uniquely formidable foe.
goals: To ambush and capture prey by trapping them in snares while leveraging its vibrations sense for detection.
relations: It is likely to be encountered in environments with other Angler Worms, and may serve as a predator in subterranean or swampy areas.
environment: Commonly found in swamps or caverns where it can effectively utilize its snare traps.
strengths: Immunity to poison and various conditions, combined with tremorsense that extends up to 60 feet, enhances its battlefield control.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to being hit in combat, especially against faster and more agile foes.
attacks: It can deliver powerful biting attacks with additional acid damage and grapple foes with its Coils for ongoing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Ethereal Lure ability creates a glowing orb that charms creatures, compelling them to move directly towards it, potentially leading them into traps.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, enhancing its ability to detect movement and vibrations for combat advantage.
skills: None notably proficient, but its Keen Touch ability grants it advantage on Perception checks reliant on vibrations.
additional_information: Grapples its prey to restrict movement and deal continuous damage.
Utilizes snares for environmental warfare, creating hazardous terrains.
Can climb walls and ceilings effortlessly, enhancing its mobility.
Low Intelligence limits its tactical flexibility but compensates with physical prowess.
Particularly dangerous in environments where it can effectively set traps.
